column4: I cant get my cd burner to work, ubuntu detects it the device maneger
and it worked under my old distro without any extra config
What are you using to try and burn?
But what are you using to burn the iso?
What is the error you get?
Have you tried mounting a normal CD in it?
it is an IDE burner right?
Are you using the user account that you created when installing?
It may be worth trying from the command-line.
Have you checked the permissions on the CD device?
Has it been working previously in Ubuntu?
You aren't trying to use ide-scsi emulation are you?
Have you checked any logs for error messages such as /var/log/messages?
Might be worth having a look, especially when you boot NGOME and try and use the nautilus CD burner.
As I don't really know what is going on.
